name: Lucifer
description: 'Lucifer' follows Lucifer Morningstar, the Devil, who abandons Hell and moves to Los Angeles to run a nightclub called Lux. He becomes an LAPD consultant, partnering with Detective Chloe Decker, to fight crime while grappling with his own identity and the complexities of human nature.

name: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a brooding professional monster hunter for hire also known as witcher, struggles to keep his humanity in a medieval dark fantasy world ruled by corrupt kings, queens and mages, where poverty, violence and intolerance are rampant.

name: Squid Game
description: A political Godfather suddenly dies and many wish to take his place and gain his power; thieves begin to dress up as politicians to claim their stake, while one name gradually emerges to be the true replacement.

name: Stranger Things
description: A political Godfather suddenly dies and many wish to take his place and gain his power; thieves begin to dress up as politicians to claim their stake, while one name gradually emerges to be the true replacement.
